name: electronjs-hello-world
description: This is a sample app created with Node.js, npm, JavaScript ES6+, TypeScript and Electron.js .

scripts.package-win: electron-packager . electronjs-hello-world-v2.0.0-app --overwrite --asar=true --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --icon=app/icon/iconWin.ico --prune=true --out=release-builds --version-string.CompanyName=CE --version-string.FileDescription=CE --version-string.ProductName="Electronjs Hello World App v.2.0.0"
scripts.tsc-compilate-project-win: tsc main.ts app.ts app\login.ts app\index.ts app\current-weather-response.ts app\current-weather.ts
